description.value:
A light blue magistone made of magicite attuned to magic specialized in accelerating the body's natural healing abilities.

Heal 1

Magical, Healing, Necromancy, Manipulate

Activate Interact, Manipulate

Frequency Once per day, plus overcharge

Target 1 creature

Range Touch

Effect The stone's color intensifies with light and heals its target by @Damage[(14d8+112)[vitality]], after which the stone goes dim until your next daily preparations.

Regenerate 3+

Magical, Healing, Necromancy, Manipulate

Activate Interact

Frequency Once per hour

Range Touch

Target 1 creature

Duration 10 minutes

Requirements The target is Silver Rank (B) or lower (no higher than level 12).

Effect

The Healstone glows with intensifying light as it channels restorative magic.

The target must hold or remain in contact with the Healstone for the duration. While doing so, the target must spend 3 actions each round to Sustain the healing (this has the Manipulate trait).

If the target stops sustaining the effect, loses contact with the stone, or becomes unconscious, the effect immediately ends and the stone’s cooldown begins.

For every minute under this effect, the target will recover 10% of its maximum hp.

This is magical healing.

Rank Disparity

If the target’s rank exceeds the Healstone’s rank, reduce the total healing by half for each rank of difference.

Example:
A Gold Ranker (2 ranks higher) target would recover only 1/4 of their maximum HP rounded down, or 2.5% of their maximum HP every minute.
